page.title: 08Haddons Farm.
page.content: Haddons farm lies on the A196 between Guidepost and Morpeth and consists of two farms,North and South ,equally divided between 400 acres.Mr Haddon works the two farms with 3 full time staff and part time help at busy times of the year.Haddons farm is a mixed farm which grows crops and has a dairy herd.Crops grown include Winter and Spring barley,peas,potatoes,hay and pasture.Cattle consist of bullocks to be sold for beef and some heifers for milking and breeding.The farm has a wide range of machinery to cover jobs such as ploughing,lifting,harvesting ,spraying and working the land eg tractors,combine harvesters and rotivators.All can be repaired in the farm workshop.
